version_description:
If you think MyWeather is helpful, please consider to write a nice review. Thank you for using MyWeather!

· iOS 9 compatibility bug fixes
· Bring back iOS 7 supports
· Supports 12/24 time format
· Added wind speed unit settings
· Auto pin daily forecast on top in timeline
· The Today Overview Info will auto switch between future and current status in this version, you could change it in app settings
· Widgets temperature now supports display as Fahrenheit
· Improved UV Index readability
· Improved push notification location detect
· Improved sunrise/sunset notification readability
· Minor Bug Fixes

If you think MyWeather is helpful, please consider to write a nice review. Thank you for using MyWeather!

· Brand new「Living Index」, including Dressing index, SPF, Vehicle restrictions, etc. *
· Subzero tempature display on icon badge with 10XX. For example, 1008 indicates -8℃
· 2 more cozy themes for winter
· Custom Modules, customise modules and orders on timeline
· Quick preview of weather forecast during search
· More intuitive wind scale and description display
· Support yesterday’s weather display in weekly overview, you can turn it off in Settings
· Display daily weather forecast in Spotlight search results
· Weekly temperature chart improved
· Redesigned Pull to Refresh UI
· Wind direction icon fixed

=Apple Watch=
· Supports watchOS2
· Multiple Complications Style (Temperature/AQI/Weather Icon)
· Supports Time Travel

* 「Living Index」might be different in your country due to availability.

If you think MyWeather is helpful, please consider to write a nice review. Thank you for using MyWeather!

=1.1.1=
· Turn off "10XX subzero-temp display mode" as default
· Timeline share snapshot ends with "Today’s weather" as default, you can turn on full page screenshot in the Settings
· Improved Timeline scroll performance

-Apple Watch-
· Redisgned UI for watchOS
· Added "Realtime weather + Temperature + AQI" complications style
· Optimized loading speed, independently load weather data without iPhone
· Optimized Complications update speed

· Redesigned Pull to Refresh UI

* 「Living Index」might be different in your country due to availability.

If you think MyWeather is helpful, please consider to write a nice review. Thank you for using MyWeather!

· Redesigned timeline style
· Improved launch speed
· New "Thermometer Mode" let you use the app as a thermometer while keep the screen on, you could enable it in Settings.
· Minor Bug Fixes

If you think MyWeather is helpful, please consider to write a nice review. Thank you for using MyWeather!

· Redesigned timeline style
· Improved launch speed
· New "Thermometer Mode" let you use the app as a thermometer while keep the screen on, you could enable it in Settings.
· Fixes iOS 7 Crash Issue
· Minor Bug Fixes

· Added more weather condition codes
· Fixes widget display issue when enable "Reduce Transparency"
· Improved compatibility with iOS 10
· Minor bug fixes

=New Feature=
· Brand new notification center widget. You can choose iOS 10 Light Style or iOS 9 Dark Style, you can also let the widget style fits the app theme
· Supports iOS 10 interactive notification center
· Theme now supports download from the cloud
· Redesigned Settings interface
· "Report Bad Data" on the top left "Paper Plane" button of every city
· Supports watchOS3 dock refresh & Featured Complications

=Improvement=
· Widgets now support location update frequency setting
· Added Tapic Engine supports to "Pull to Refresh" for iPhone 6s & iPhone 7 users
· Minimize package install size
· Minor Bug Fixes

· Supports watchOS3 dock refresh & Featured Complications

· Fixes save to album crash on iOS 10
· Fixes incorrect widget height on iOS 10 in some devices

· Siri shortcuts are fully enhanced to support dozens of detailed data such as rainfall probability, forecast, air quality, etc., go to "More" - "Settings" - "Siri Shortcut Settings"
· Improve the scroll efficiency of the city forecast timeline
· Improved Apple Watch complication settings
· Support Watch OS5 Siri watch face
· Fixed an issue where some users always showed "Locating…"
· Advanced Feature: A new Siri shortcut "Copy weather data to clipboard". Combine with "Shortcuts" app for more advanced operations
· Minor Bug Fixes

· Now supports new iPad Pro resolution

· Support Watch OS5 Siri watch face

We made the Dark Mode, which existed four years ago, even better.
· When using the "Day & Night" theme, you can select "Follow System Settings (iOS 13+)", "Brightness Sensing" and "Sunrise Sunset".
· Customizable light and dark mode themes
· Notification Center Widget fits iOS 13 Dark Mode
· Other details improvement and optimization

Now Supports New iOS 14 Home Screen Widgets
· 5 brand new widgets: real-time weather, weather forecast, life index, air quality, world weather. Support multiple display sizes.
· New automatic dark mode: most light themes now automatically support dark mode, you can go to the app settings for more settings
